ticket: Dear HR, I'm Virginie Thibault from the administration office and worikng as secretary and administrative assistant. I would like to ask you whether is it possible to have a salary increase of the 9%, so to pass from my current salary of 45400 euros to 49500 euros. Thank you in advance for your comprehension and your kind response. Best regards, VT.
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear Sir./Madam., this email is to make you aware of an unacceptable behavior from a colleague working in my office. In particular, this colleague offended me and discriminated me because of my nationality. I hope you could find a way to solve this situation soon. Thanks in advance for your comprehension. Best, Alexandre
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket:
Dear colleagues, 
I need to request a time off of at least 3 months due to a serious illness of a close family member. I have already talked with my manager about this and I have her full support. 
The sooner I can start this time off the better. Would it be possible to first set the time period to 3 months with the option to extend it if needed? 

Best regards, 
Julien Robin
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket:
Dear colleagues, 

there is a personal issue in our team structure that I need to share with you. I work in my current team for about nine years now and my current manager is with us for about seven years. At first, I got to know her as a fair and honourable person. 
But in the past few years, I have witnessed again and again that my manager is favouring a certain colleague in our team. 
My suspicion was first raised when that colleague was promoted to T3 way before her peers even though she does not take more responsibility than average or shows significantly better result. Plus, although it is important for everyone in the team to regularly attend conferences, the favourited colleage gets to attend these conferences at least twice as often as other colleagues in our team. 
There are many other examples that strengthed my suspicion and I do not want to go into details now. 
I am not sure how to address this properly. I have not confronted my manager or my colleague about this. But I definitely do not want to leave this unadressed. Could you please help me / us as a team to address this issue in the right way? 

Kind regards, 
Gerta Wernecke
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket:
Dear colleagues, 
I want to get a refund for the plane ticket from Nuernberg to London on the 13th Aug 2016. I have created a corresponding report in Concur and submitted it. That was about three weeks ago. But so far, I did not get any notification if the report is accepted. The IO under which I booked is: 29671028356. 
Could you please assist in this issue? 
I added the receipt for the plane ticket as an attachment. 

Best regards, 
Clemens Hoefig
label: Refund_Refund travel

ticket:
Dear colleagues, In accordance with SAP business ethics guide, I would like to
 report to you my concerns regarding my colleague John Smith (I-numner I1233455) . 
John and I are working together on a contract with a new customer.  The customer has invited John several times to an expensive restaurant and proposed us gifts. According to our business conduct policy, I have refused the gifts, but I think John has acceopted them.
In our last proposal for the customer John has suggested a very large discount for the customer which I find  not justified .
John is a good colleague and a reliable employee. I do nto want to cause him an unnesssary harm, but I think his judgement might be misguided in this case and I would like ot ask you to check the contract proposal . Kind regards, Korbinian
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket:

 flight from the business trip, I was obliged to purchased a new plane ticket

I would like to request a refund for the ticket.
Thanks,
Quique

ticket:
Dear colleagues,
One of my direct reports, John Doe, has been promotelast year d to a first line supervisor of production. John has showed himself exceptionally dedicated to the new role and has increased the productivity of his team by 5%.
Considering his exceptional engagement I woudl like to request a 7% raise to his salary (i.e. from 67100 euro to 71800 euro) , starting form the next month. 
This was agreed with my upper management, please assist with teh implementation of the increase in the system.
Sincerely,
Gerard

ticket:
Dear colleagues,
I would like to bring to your attention that my direct manager is not treating 
employees in his team equally and reserves a special favorite treatment to Ann 
Smith.
The team cohesion and working atmosphere suffer greatly because of this special
relationship and I would ask you to take immediate measures with regard to my manager's behaviour.
Kind regards,
Andrea
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket:
Dear colleagues,
I would like to reach out to you to signal an inappropriate behaviour of my 
colleagues Peter Brown. As you know I have a recognised disability. I value 
greatly the diversity and inclusion policy which exists in our company. Until
Peter has joined our team I had never encountered a discrimination because
of my difference. However, Peter on several occasions has made a diminishing
remarks towards me with regard to my disability, or behaved himself in such a
 way as to exclude me from the team acivity .  Even after the team colleagus and 
the manager has remarked several times that his behaviour is inappropriate, 
he continued to discriminate against me.
I request you take an appropriate action with regard to Peter, so that I can 
continue to work in decent and acceptable environement, Sincerely yours,
Anne
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket:
Dear colleagues,
In the recent salary review I have discovered that my colleague Swen, who was 
hired at the same time as me, has the same qualifications and work experience
as me, is payed 22.5% more than I.
You advertise yourself as an equal opportunity employer, with diversity,
inclusion and equal pay policies, so I was left shocked by this discovery. Thus I
formally request an written explanation of this inacceptable pay gap, fro which
I can see no other reason than gender difference.
Sicerely,
Henriette
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to you about serious matter, happened to me recently while interacting with one of my colleagues. After my work was presented on the meeting I was expecting sincere and open discussion, but my colleague used his prejudice about male workers under 25 not working properly, indicating and discriminating me by gender and age. While I was not sure if I want to make a complaing, I am expecting an investigation into this matter, identifying the incorrectness of my colleague behaviour and making him appreciate the workplance and coworkers from any gender group or age. Looking foward to the next steps. Best regards, Gisa Klingehöfer.
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, After working in your company for a while I have got an impression of my colleagues' salaries being different from mine based on the gender gap. I would not say I have exact numbers but according to my experience most male workers have higher salary on similar positions then female. The direct example is my wife who works with me in one team and having the same level of experience as I do, while getting much less appreciation in salary for her work, in particular 13.6% less. Could you please explain how the gender equality principles are used in this matter, at least in our individual case? I would like to know more factы about the average salary differences between male and female workers in out company to be convinced me and my wife work for the company valueing these things. Hope for getting more info from you as soon as possible. Best regards, Jerzy Hentschel.
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, I would like to initiate discussion on my potential salary raise as I have made definitive extensive research on job salaries in my region being higher by 5% then my current salary in your company as automative service technicians and mechanic. By constanly improving my job quality and effectiveness through years I see, that my workload increased, and I was ealuated more on my recent review by my manager and committee, but no salary increase followed. I would like to ask for increase from  €48300 to €50700. I would appreciate for follow up on my request and settle this matter until the end of next month. Best regards, Ramona Wulf.
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, I am expecting to come to France next month, but still did not get any details about accomadation, provided by company at Paterson. ticket:
Hello,
I want to request a salary raise of 7% (from 58500€ to 62600€). Actually I had no salary raise for 3 years, and after a discussion with some colleagues, it appears that some of them get a salary raise in their side.
My previous manager told me that there was not enough remuneration package for the team during last years, and that I will be the next one to get the salary increase for this year. Unfortunately, my manager has changed end of last year, and he did not apply the decision from previous manager, and I get the minimal increase of 1,2% which is unfair.
I expect to fill the gape and to get the 7% increase as discussed previously. 
Thanks 

Marcelo Vizcaino
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket:

ticket: Hi, Off late, I've been facing pain in the back, which were not relieved with the regular medications. I've had to make an appointment with an Orthopedician for consultation. After a detailed set of tests, it was concluded that I've Osteoporosis, a condition that causes bones to become weak and fragile. I've been asked to take extra care while I continue with my day-to-day activiites. I'd need, at first, sick leaves for about 7 days (starting August 19, 2018) to get better with the condition and to undergo initial treatment at the hospital, and then rest at home before I resume my work back. Thank you! Regards, Eric Atkins
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Hello, with respect to my upcoming visit at your premises in Oberhausen, could you provide any support with the accomodation? The plan is to stay for 12 months. Thank you.
label: Ask information_Accommodation

ticket: Hello, unfortunately I was robbed and I have to take of the process with the insurance. I would thus like to ask for some days off. Thank you in advance.
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear sir, madame, I would like to escalate as I think that my direct manager does not value my work and contibutions to the company success and that's impacting my career as I am stuck in the same position since 5 years. At the current stage I do not see how i could advance my position and i would like to have the opportunity to discuss my situation with a third, independent party. Thank you.
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear sir/madame, I think that my salary of 35900 euros is not alaigned with the average salary for a security guard and gambling surveillance officer. I am thus asking for a raise of 5% to 37700 euros. Thank you.
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Hello, I have a medical exam on the 16th of June that will require 10 days of follow up care. Could you please confirm a 10 days sick leave starting on the 16 of June?
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear sir/madame, I would like to ask for a refurn of a plane ticket planned for the 15th of November 2016 from Munich to Dubai (Dubai Internation Airport). Could you confirm the refund? Thank you.
label: Refund_Refund travel

ticket: Hello, I would like to ask for 4 days of sick leave as of the 31st of October because of a arm fracture. Let me know if I should provide any document. Thank you.
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Hello, I would like to get some more information about my upcoming 6 months staying at Badajoz. In particular could you share the details about the accomodation?
label: Ask information_Accommodation

ticket: Hello, I would like to ask for a 1 days sick leave fot the 12 of October because of a laboratory exam. Thank you.
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Dear sir, madame, I would like to ask for a refund of my travel from Hannover to Catania booked for the 23rd of Sempteber 2015. The fligh was planned from Hannover to the Catania-Fontanarossa Airport in Catania. Could you please confirm the refund of the plane ticket?
label: Refund_Refund travel

ticket: Dear sir, madame, I would like to report a colleague who discriminated me because of my gender. Please provide my with a channel where I can share further details about what happened. Thank you.
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: To whom it may concern, I will be on a 6 months mission at Kassel, starting the beginning of next month, and I unfortunately have not managed to find accomodation. Do you have any relevant infomrmation that could help me with nthis? Or could you provide some contacts from Kassel's office that could offer me some assistance? Thanks in advance. Best regards, Imke
label: Ask information_Accommodation

ticket: Dear HR service, I would like to request a sick leave for tomorrow June 16th at least, as I broke my leg  and I will not be able to come to work tomorrow. Just to let you know, I might need to request a period to work from home, I will open another HR ticket once I get the confirmation from my doctor. Thanks! Regards, Susanne
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: Hello, I will need to spend a month in our offices in Ontario in the coming year and I was wondering if our company provides any temporal accomodation for such situations. If not, would you please recommend any websites to go through? Also, I would like to know if it is feasible to get a flat/studio for just one month or is it recommended to get a hotel for such a short period? Best, Richard
label: Ask information_Accommodation

ticket: Dear HR department, my wife is pregnant and she is going through some health issues that constitute a high risk for the baby and for her. Therefore, I would like to request some days off to be able to assist my wife. Best, Gerlind
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, I recently have been discriminated in the course of work by a colleague that admitted that the reason was related to my disability. I want to specify that my disability does not interfere, in any sort, with the work activity in question here. Therefore, I would like to fill in a complaint, can you please  refer me to the process for filing complaints please? Regards, Hildegund
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, Due to an unfortunate event, I have to take some time off to take care of my sick father until he gets back on his feet. Looking at the current situation, it would be difficult to know when I will be able to come back to work, I would take one week off for now, but I might need to extend my time off later on. Thank you for your understanding. Regards, Ludmilla
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear HR, I have been working with the company for 3 years now, through which I believe that I had shown prove of commitment and responsibility. Given my hard work, especially lately with the increasing working load on our bars, and my loyalty to the company, I would like to kindly ask you to consider a salary raise of  9% this year. I am looking forward to hear back from you. Best, Paulino
label: Salary_Salary raise

ticket: Dear Sir/Madam, I would like to change my working shift from Monday July 3rd to Tuesday July 11th, as I have to attend the funeral of my uncle that will take place the Monday of my shift. Please let me know if it would be possible. I appreciate your help. Regards, Amanda
label: Timetable change_Shift change

ticket: Dear HR service, I am contacting you to request the refund of my plane ticket. I traveled in July 10th to meet with one of our clients in Amman. My plane ticket, from Barcelona El Prat airport to Amman Queen Alia Airport, cost $546,87. I am also attaching the invoice of the plane ticket. Thank you for your assistance. Best, Faustinoi
label: Refund_Refund travel

ticket: Hello, I will have  a medical related visit on September 29th, thus I would like to take that day as a sick leave, as my visit overlaps with my working hours. Best regards, Murat
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: To whom it may concern, In some encounters with a few of our clients, I had some leads that made me think that one of my colleagues might be involved in bribing the clients in question, which constitutes an illegal action according to our company's policy. Can you please direct me to what I should do next to raise this issue? thanks. Regards, Brandon
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear HR department, I need to take my father to the hospital on Thursday March 15th which coincides with my day shift, would it be possible to change my shift of March 15th to March 24th? Thanks. Regards, Justin
label: Timetable change_Shift change

ticket: Hello, I am looking for accomodation in Turin, Italy for my one month mission there. Could you please recommend me some ressources, as in websites or particular agencies, that our company is used to rely on? Thank you for your help. Best, Alessandro
label: Ask information_Accommodation

ticket: Dear HR department, Working in the same team for 7 years and a half now, I feel that my career path is limited by my superior, as he does not give me the opportunity to prove my real potential and he usually takes credits for my work. I would like to raise this issue, so could you please refer me to how to do that? Thank you for your help. Best, Thibaut
label: Complaint_complaint

ticket: Dear HR service, I am getting married in 3 months and I would like to request the exceptional 4 days off  dedicatedby law for marriage, starting Monday 23rd of June. Best, Giacinto
label: Life event_Personal issues

ticket: Dear HR department, my colleagues and I recently came to know that there is a considerable gender pay gap of 29.4% in our company, and I would like to have an explanation of such a high gap, particularly that men and women, in our company are occupying similar positions with comaparble responsabilities and working same amount of hours, which does not justify this number. I am looking forward for your answer. Regards, Hedda
label: Salary_Gender pay gap

ticket: Dear HR department, I would like to request the refund of my plane ticket that I personally purchased for my last mission, that took place April 7th, 2017. It is a two ways tickets from Lyon, Saint-Exupéry Airport to Marrakech, Menara Airport of a total cost of $353.49. Here attached you will finde the invoice of the plane ticket. Thank you for your assistance. Best, Céline
label: Refund_Refund travel

ticket: To whom it may concern, I am requesting a one day sick leave for tomorrow November 21st, as I have been diagnosed with a health issue that requieres home rest. I am attaching the doctor's justification for the sick leave. Regards, Leslie
label: Life event_Health issues

ticket: To whom it may concern, Given the high inflation this year, as well as to meet with my growing responsibility, I would like to request a salary raise of  5%. My current salary is $58400 and it would increase to $62300 with the salary raise. Thank you for your thoughtful consideration. Best regards, Cindy
label: Salary_Salary raise
